review: Roku, in my opinion, is the best streaming media device on the market and at a great price. I have the Roku 2 and the Roku streaming stick and there is no discernible difference. I use Roku to watch MLB, Netflix, Amazon Prime, HBO Plus, Vevo, Youtube, Hulu Plus, ESPN and Slingbox. The Roku stick allows you to cut back on your cable or satellite services. For services like HBO Plus, Slingbox and ESPN, you need either cable or satellite to use. The other services all you need is internet and a Roku. For anyone who is considering getting into a good streaming media device, a Roku streaming stick is your best bet. There is a remote control and full access to all of the apps that the full size Roku devices have. For those who are intimidated by any technology, this is for you. It is simple to set up and simple to use. I highly recommend this device.
